column4: hi there..  I see one of my packages has 2 entries when I do apt-cache show on it. Somehow the latest version is never detected when I do an apt-get upgrade. Any ideas on how I can proceed to upgrade to the last version (it should be there when its shown in apt-cache right?)
I removed the strange package using apt-get remove, then just using apt-get install worked. Instead of install --reinstall
